script-var.name: FileLogLevel
script-var.comment: Level of logging to be directed files

script-var.name: thorBranch
script-var.comment: Branch where configuration settings are held

script-var.name: thorName
script-var.comment: Name of thor instance where configuration branch is stored

script-var.name: ConsoleLogLevel
script-var.comment: Level of logging to be directed to Console

script-var.name: GROUP
script-var.comment: Name of Jini Group to use in default config
